items.content_html: I just realized reading Ben Thompson that the Young Girl’s Illustrated Primer from Neal Stephenson’s The Diamond Age is going to be the norm in social media in 5-10 years. It seemed so fantastic and unimaginable at the time.
items.content_text: I just realized reading [Ben Thompson](https://stratechery.com/2022/instagram-tiktok-and-the-three-trends/) that the Young Girl's Illustrated Primer from Neal Stephenson's The Diamond Age is going to be the norm in social media in 5-10 years. It seemed so fantastic and unimaginable at the time.
